mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, VOTE_ID, CREATE_AT, CONTENT, FIRST_ANSWER, SECOND_ANSWER FROM vote
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOTE (user_id, content, first_answer, second_answer, vote_id, create_at) VALUES ( #{USER_ID}, #{CONTENT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FIRST_ANSWER, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SECOND_ANSWER, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VOTE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT VOTE_ID FROM VOTE WHERE CONTENT = #{CONTENT, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND FIRST_ANSWER = #{FIRST_ANSWER, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SECOND_ANSWER = #{SECOND_ANSWER, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY create_at desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOTE_ANSWER ( vote_id, vote_answer_id ) VALUES ( #{VOTE_ID}, VOTE_ANSWER_SEQ.NEXTVAL )
mapper.select: SELECT A.FIRST_RATIO , A.SECOND_RATIO ,(A.FIRST_ANSWER_COUNT + A.SECOND_ANSWER_COUNT) as TOTAL_ANSWER_COUNT , (SELECT NVL(CHK, 'none') FROM MY_VOTE_ANSWER WHERE USER_ID = 0 and VOTE_ID = B.VOTE_ID) AS CHK , B.USER_ID , B.VOTE_ID , B.CONTENT , B.FIRST_ANSWER , B.SECOND_ANSWER FROM VOTE_ANSWER A LEFT JOIN VOTE B ON A.VOTE_ID = B.VOTE_ID WHERE A.VOTE_ID = #{VOTE_ID}
SELECT USER_ID, VOTE_ID, CONTENT, FIRST_ANSWER, SECOND_ANSWER FROM VOTE WHERE VOTE_ID = #{VOTE_ID}

SELECT
D.FIRST_RATIO , D.SECOND_RATIO , (D.FIRST_ANSWER_COUNT + D.SECOND_ANSWER_COUNT) as TOTAL_ANSWER_COUNT , NVL( (SELECT CHK FROM MY_VOTE_ANSWER WHERE USER_ID = 0 and VOTE_ID = B.VOTE_ID) , 'none' ) AS CHK , B.USER_ID , B.VOTE_ID , B.CONTENT , B.FIRST_ANSWER , B.SECOND_ANSWER FROM VOTE_ANSWER D LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY C.CREATE_AT DESC) AS ROW_NUM , C.* FROM VOTE C) B ON D.VOTE_ID = B.VOTE_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.ROW_NUM > #{startIdx} AND B.ROW_NUM <= #{endIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE VOTE_ANSWER SET FIRST_ANSWER_COUNT = #{FIRST_ANSWER_COUNT}, SECOND_ANSWER_COUNT = #{SECOND_ANSWER_COUNT}, FIRST_RATIO = #{FIRST_RATIO}, SECOND_RATIO = #{SECOND_RATIO} WHERE VOTE_ID = #{VOTE_ID}
